-- Noir --

Noir scrounges around in the storage box a bit more and finds 
another communicator beacon. After dragging it out from under a 
rusted blaster, and small computer frame, she tosses it into the 
box. 

"Any idea how many of these things Devilcat wanted us to find?" Noir 
asks Torin as she straightens, and looks over at the lizard-bot. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Torin::
> 
> Her companion thinks for a moment, then switches over to beast 
mode - 
> a Nile Monitor lizard - considering this form to be more effective 
> than his robot mode for pure rummaging.  "Phoenix made one good 
point 
> while she was here," he says.  "This stuff really should be 
sorted."  
> His claws wrench open a storage crate with a Maximal insignia and 
> quickly unearth a few more beacons from the jumble of gear.  "Ha!  
I 
> got FOUR!"  He grins a lizard grin as he dumps them into the box.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Noir --
> > 
> > Noir reaches the cargo hold in a short time. The sliding door 
opens 
> > quickly, and she steps inside. As she begins her search, she is 
soon 
> > joined by Torin who was right behind her.
> > 
> > "Communicator beacons... Might as well start by checking the 
opened 
> > sotrage boxes." She says, heading over to a large box, about 
half 
> > her size.
> > 
> > When she looks into it, she finds it moderately full of odds and 
> > ends... some broken computer parts, a few weapons... and a few 
> > communicator beacons.
> > 
> > "Found two..." She says, and keeps looking after throwing them 
into 
> > an empty container she'd grabbed as they'd come in.
